name: Thabo Nkosi

He has a reserved personality but is adaptable and patient, which helps him manage the mixed social pressures he faces while considering the purchase of his first smartphone. Currently in a public space and feeling the urgency to make a decision, Thabo's detailed attention to features and visual learning style guides him towards making a balanced choice that meets his needs.
